rows.label: tlk45370154_02_msg0001
rows.name:
The Superbian Army has a
policy of actively scouting
new Drivers to recruit.

rows.label: tlk45370154_02_msg0002
rows.name:
The main goal, of course, is to bolster
our own forces, but it also helps avoid
Drivers being recruited by rival nations.

rows.label: tlk45370154_02_msg0003
rows.name:
This is why we carry out
scouting activities in as many
territories as we can manage.

rows.label: tlk45370154_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Gula is a particular focus,
because many Gulan still harbor
ill feeling towards the Empire.

rows.label: tlk45370154_02_msg0005
rows.name:
It would be quite troublesome
if they were to throw their
lot in with Invidia.

rows.label: tlk45370154_02_msg0006
rows.name:
So we encourage them to join our
military before that happens.
